mapper.select: select employee_id, employee_name, employee_email, auth, department_id, department_name, edate, erank, newfilename from maeil_member where employee_id=#{employee_id} and employee_password=#{employee_password}
mapper.insert: insert into maeil_member(employee_name, employee_password, employee_email, department_id, department_name, auth, edate, erank) values (#{employee_name}, #{employee_password}, #{employee_email}, #{department_id}, #{department_name}, #{auth}, now(), #{erank})
